ingredients: 2 (14-ounce) packages frozen puff pastry, defrosted in the refrigerator no longer than 6 hours
2 cups cooked mashed sweet potato (or canned)
1/2 block or 4 ounces cream cheese, roughly cut into 1 inch pieces, room temperature
¼ teaspoon freshly ground white pepper
½ cup (60 grams) bread or all-purpose flour
